channel.title: Interactive on Links & Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Interactive on Links & Notes

item.title: Reuters Made a Cozy Game About Cozy Games
item.description:
Reuters created an interactive experience exploring how “cozy games” help with mental health. It’s a clever way to tell the story while letting readers experience the calm, low-pressure gameplay these games are known for.

Related Links

  • NiemanLab coverage - Analysis of this journalism approach
  • Untitled Goose Game - A perfect example of a game that brought joy during difficult times
